website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, quality spot cleaner that produces good cleaning results.
pros: Users praise this unit for its fantastic ability to get out stains, even stubborn, ground-in dirt and older stains
Its convenient portable design and good extraction power are other stand-out points
cons: A few sprayer and nozzle issues
A few defective or damaged machines on delivery

customer_reviews.title: Would like to rate higher but just can't
customer_reviews.text: Would like to rate higher but just can't. Pretty big disappointment. I've had for a few months, worked really well in the beginning, then it started leaking dirty water from the bottom of the machine. I would have to clean up behind the machine..Then the sprayer stopped working a few weeks later. Figured I'd just keep using by spraying cleaning fluid with a independent sprayer and just use the rug doctor to vacuum up. After doing that fro a few weeks, rug doctor got louder and lost suction. Now I have a fairly expensive piece of plastic. Not sure what I will do next. Fairly disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work right
customer_reviews.text: Tried this out for the first time tonight. Good suction power. Does not do a spectacular job at removing stains. However the nozzle/hose is absolute crap. It leaks everywhere! I think mine might be defective.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Worthless piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This was the second Rug Doctor that I purchased as the first one didn't work right out of the box. No solution would spray out at all. So I sent that one back immediately and ordered a replacement. The second one worked......three times. Over the weekend I tried to use it and only a couple of drops came out the spray nozzle. And of course I am past my whole 30 days to return it. The replacement parts that can be ordered don't include a new spray nozzle. So-now this is useless and I am out the money I paid with no machine to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: SallyT

customer_reviews.title: Used item. Buyer be aware.
customer_reviews.text: I received a used item when I thought I was purchasing a new item. I didn't ask for a used it. So that is why I gave it one star. Video proof. I thought I was recording while unpackaging the box but I was not. But I did look at the product with you all for the first time and took it apart to find dirty water and scratches.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Leaked on first use
customer_reviews.text: HEED THE WARNINGS FROM THE NEGATIVE REVIEWS!! Complete waste of money. It leaves a big puddle of dirty water under the unit. I didn't know this product was defective until after the Amazon return period had expired. Rug Doctor wants me to spend $40 to ship the unit to a repair center because there isn't a "certified" Rug Doctor technician within 100 miles of me. I should have just bought the Bissell to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Ben T.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great little unit.
customer_reviews.text: We've got a little dog (3lb Yorkie) that is getting older and is having accidents or just doesn't care about hitting the pads as much as he did in the past. He knows when he's been a bad doggie because he hides from us, (the stinking little pooper). This is great for the little 1 foot square or less spots that need to be cleaned. I'm always amazed at how dark the drain water is after using it. Makes me want to go and get a larger floor unit to clean the entire area.
customer_reviews.author: jjqxsevv

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all
customer_reviews.text: Have had problems with this since I bought it. The unit leaks, the sprayer does not distribute the spray at all and the suction is poor. I've had $60 Bissell units that worked better than this. Hoping Rug Doctor will replace this but what a pain. Unfortunately, I'm a week late to return this or I would. Spoke to rug Doctor and I'll need to pay shipping to return the device. Stick with Bissell.
customer_reviews.author: rosko

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 uses :/
customer_reviews.text: Hello, my wonderful rug doctor broke after 3 uses and am so sad as must have told a dozen strangers about how great it was. I went to work abroad came home and used it for the first time and the container that collects the dirty water did not collect it and spilled all over our floors. I was steam cleaning the sofa and did not notice it. How/where do I return it as must have just got a bad apple as normally rug doctors are so reliable. I have the original box...
customer_reviews.author: Jedidiah

customer_reviews.title: does the job for quick spotting and upholstery...good suction,
customer_reviews.text: I boutght this after researching the many comments on this and competitors products...Red seemed to be considered most durable and best suction (pitty the others if this is tru because this is not that great) ...just got it ... will update after 1 year.. but 1stimpression is that it will do the job...but overall design/ergonomics could be better Pros: small foot print, easly moved about, good suction seems well constructed (Iwould say the hose conection points are the weak link) cons; motorizedhead is a waste, head is cumbersome and spray is directed at 90% to hose..should be aimed right behind the scrubber. as noted in the othe comments... the wash and reinse containers are awkward and need a flat bottom.
customer_reviews.author: The Critic

customer_reviews.title: this little cleaner works great, i love it
customer_reviews.text: this little cleaner works great, i love it. my husband is handicapped and he had a accident before he was taken to the hospital by ambulance. it was all over the mattress, pee and poop. this little machine took all of it out and the smell too. i though i was going to have to get a new mattress, because i can't stand the smell. i am getting up in age too and i can't handle a big one anymore. i am glad i bought this machine. thank you Jeanne
customer_reviews.author: jeanne potvin

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a Godsend
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 kids. And a husband. And apparently very disgusting carpet and furniture, as well. I used this to clean up liquid foundation from my bedroom carpet that was very unappealing (thanks kid # 3) and it worked so well that I decided to move to the living room. I never realized how truly revolting my favorite chairs were. The water was nearly black, and my chairs were beautifully revived. This is my new favorite toy.
customer_reviews.author: HS90

customer_reviews.title: Tested and Approved!  Toddler boy mom
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used my fair share of carpet cleaners and I love the rug doctor. Most cleaners are pretty comparable in terms of cleaning. The one thing that sets the rug doctor apart for me is I don’t have to “fight” the cleaner to empty and fill it. Really easy to use and it does the job! I have two boys under 5, so I use it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: savvydiva

customer_reviews.title: Better than a competing small green machine
customer_reviews.text: It's much heavier and sturdier than the box store offerings. We went through a heated and non-heated competitor's model where the motors and heating units worked flawlessly, but the nozzle and attachments all fell apart along with the shoddy hoses. This machine after several years of ownership, and infrequent use, has not shown the slightest hint of failure. The tanks do not leak and it is easy to operate and clean up to store. If I had my way, I would not have carpet in the house with a toddler and dog but until that day comes, this is a must for quick cleanups and spot cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: J. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Cleans good but hard to fill and empty
customer_reviews.text: The machine cleaned very well; however, I have a few issues with the parts: the “clean water” bin isn’t flat on the bottom so it’s very difficult to pour the detergent from the bottle and balance the bin—-which is full of water—-at the same time. Likewise, emptying the dirty bin was a nightmare. I pulled the bin out, slowly, and the water went all over the floor because there’s no cap on the bin so when you pull it out there’s nothing keeping it in there. I do like that it has a handle and wheels, especially because it’s so heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole T.

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome (but loud) !!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is powerful ! It works very well. The only thing I dislike is the noise level. It is loud ! I guess it has to be, because the suction is very good. I replaced a Bissell little green with this. After two Bissell machines that died, I've had enough of those. I always cleaned them meticulously and they still failed. Hopefully this will last...
customer_reviews.author: Hosewater

customer_reviews.title: Puddle of liquid underneath machine after turning off.
customer_reviews.text: We recently got a new puppy and I knew a spot cleaner would be necessary for puppy accidents. After using the Rug Doctor about 10 times it started leaving a puddle of liquid on the floor from the cleaning solution container. I am disappointed that after only using the Rug Doctor for approximately 3 months the window for returns is no longer available. I will be shopping for a new spot cleaner but not the Rug Doctor brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cwish

customer_reviews.title: $2 spray tip broke after just a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box the machine was OK. Not great, not terrible--just OK. Vacuum head is a bit too big and awkward. But then I noticed the spray tip was messing up. Thought it might be clogged but turns out it was broken (inside the hand held vacuum head). I think I can probably replace it but if you're not handy with tools/repairs this $2 part may be the Achille's heal of your machine. I'd probably not buy again given what I now know.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Best Spot Cleaner Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Bissel and Hoover product before. Did not realize what I was missing until I purchased this Rug Doctor. I can not rate the durability because I have only used it a few times. But, so far it does a great job cleaning and it is very easy to clean out the waste. Much better than my previous machines. The suction is also better than I was expecting. Well designed product. I would recommend to anyone who needs to easily cleanup after their pup.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Crockwell

customer_reviews.title: This Rug Doctor is excellent BUT...
customer_reviews.text: be aware that it has no upright handle. You have to use the hose and nozzle by hand. I thought it had an upright position like a vacuum cleaner and it could be used like other rug cleaners but this is not made for cleaning rugs. Its function is to do spot cleaning although we did use it for a heavily traveled area on our rug but we had to use it on our hands and knees. I'm glad we got it but we had to rent the regular Rug Doctor from the market in order to clean the full carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: jerry spencer

customer_reviews.title: MOTOR BURNED UP AFTER 2 USES. CUSTOMER SERVICE HORRIBLE! WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: After using only 2 times, the motor burned up! We called Rug Doctor and said there was nothing they could do. We called again and this time they said they would send a label for us to send it back and they would "fix" it. It took several calls and 3 weeks to get the label!! We finally got it back and there was water in one of the reservoirs and it was dirty! They obviously don't care about customer satisfaction! Do NOT waste your money on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Camilla Brownrigg

customer_reviews.title: Gives Stains A Licking!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love!!! I have a bratty little dog that likes to lick round, saturated wet patches onto my couch and nothing I have done to try and get the stain out has worked save for soaking the entire cushion and making it a giant wet patch. (I swear, I didn't try that method on purpose!) I thought that I would try this little guy after seeing demonstrations in reviews on youtube. All I can say is WOW! I went over the spots once and they lightened, so I thought a second might lighten them more, but no! The spots are completely gone! I'm amazed and ecstatic and recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: An amazon reviewer

customer_reviews.title: poor design
customer_reviews.text: One the second use, the sprayer stopped working properly. Its hard to fill up the reservoir due to the design of the tank (you can't sit it down). It claims strong suction power but its not that great. Aside from being able to wheel it around and the scrubber on the underside of the handheld part, this thing is a piece of junk. I tried to get a return or exchange but Amazon said I was outside of my 30 day return window so now I have a $150 paper weight. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Rosenbalm

customer_reviews.title: worked great cleaning sofa
customer_reviews.text: bought this to clean furniture and my sofa was filled with stains and spots from kid spills and dog messes. the machine worked great. got the sofa looking like new. Suction was great, cleaning worked perfectly and little issues. the clean and dirty water vessels are designed that makes them hard to fill and empty without some juggling but I can live with that, especially at the price and performance level. wish I would've taken a before picture to be able show the improvement it made
customer_reviews.author: Nacole M Breitbach

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE machine leaks and doesn’t work. They won’t help you
customer_reviews.text: Called rug doctor because it began leaking dirty water all over and the sprayer no longer works. Now it’s just a boat anchor. Company told me I have to pay $70 to have it shipped to have it possibly repaired. Now they’re saying it’s out of warranty. Machine breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Dahl

customer_reviews.title: This machine sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Let me say first that I had a Bissell Green Machine, it stopped working after using it twice. I tried everything to get it to work again. So I broke down and looked for another small carpet cleaner. This one so fit the bill. Someone actually said that the suction wasn’t good on this rug doctor, I truly believe theirs had a problem. Because this Rug Doctor has a ton more suction than my Bissell ever had. Overall this is a great machine. It is bigger than the Bissell but I’m totally fine with that. It works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Diane Baan

customer_reviews.title: Best spot cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have owned at least 5 other brands of spot cleaners that do the same thing. This is the best of them. The suction is stronger and the vibrating motion in the tool helps a lot. The cord and hose storage spaces are outstanding. The only reason I marked the item 4 instead of 5 is because the tanks have some problems. They will not sit upright when full (either clean or dirty water tanks). Also I am a senior with arthritis in my hands and I frequently cannot remove the tanks from the machine because I cannot get a firm grasp on them. They need a handle that fingers can slip underneath to pull harder.
customer_reviews.author: Dazymom

customer_reviews.title: Sucks, in a good way...
customer_reviews.text: Spilled coffee on my mother in laws new couch. All the local carpet / Upholstery cleaners had a minimum charge, usually like $100-150.00 for a ten minute job. Had to wait two days for this to arrive, with crossed fingers that it would do the job. Performed like a champ. I bought a big jug of cleaner, not knowing it comes with enough for a couple of tanks of solution. One tip- for small jobs, only fill the solution tank 1/3 to half way at most cause u end up throwing it out or storing it separately for the next time of u want. Also, if u plan on going over it a second time with just plain water.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Turner

customer_reviews.title: Won't last
customer_reviews.text: Over all out of the box use was great but this review is a year into using the portable rug doctor if you use it as much as I did it won't last it will start to leak brown stinky dirty water out the bottom due to water vapor passing through the dirty water container to the motor and the motor will start to lose suction making it a waste of time to use it
customer_reviews.author: Young L.A.

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.text: I would use this to clean up dog puke from area rug when my dogs would puke. I used it twice and BOTH times, when you go to dump dirty water, it spills everywhere as soon as you lift the container! Then you spend about 35 minutes cleaning up all the nasty puke water from your clean floor, all the while the machine just continues to leak all of its shampoo water from the clean tank, and all the water stored in the hose. You clean, and 3 seconds later theres another puddle. Makes way more of a mess than just cleaning the spot with a towel. Absolutely worthless, and I love Rug doctor products. Not this one. Returning immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I gave it another shot... :(
customer_reviews.text: I actually ended up ordering this machine twice. The first one started having problems on the same day it arrived. I started cleaning my couch, following all the instructions and then all-of-a-sudden the sprayer on the hose stopped working. I had been using it for 30 minutes! The little moving brush also stopped working. So I sent it back for a replacement. The replacement unit was defective right out of the box. The sprayer on the hose never worked. I decided to manually spray the surfaces I needed cleaned and vacuumed them up - I cleaned my car and my couch and I'm sending this back for good.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Kerner

customer_reviews.title: It has been a great addition to the full size unit for cleaning smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: This has worked perfectly for cleaning my stairs and other spot cleaning areas. The handle is a little on the weak side but it has worked well so far as long as you are careful when moving the unit using the handle in its extended position. It has been a great addition to the full size unit for cleaning smaller spots. Rug Doctor is definitely the best option for all carpet cleaning needs. My carpet is 20+ years old and using this product has given it a new life and will allow me to extend replacement a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as good as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little unit. Even though the vac head has a vibrating brush, I prefer to use the vacuum head in a back & forth motion then a final suction. The suction is great for a little vacuum such as this one. Nice for cleaning up cat barf.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hed

customer_reviews.title: Works on a microfiber couch for family of 5
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it on my disgusting microfiber couch (i have 3 young children haha) but I'm impressed so far. The only reason I took away 1 star is becauseuse when you are suctioning up the dirty water and pull the head away from the fabric it causes the soap dispenser to release a little water. Not a huge deal but I would prefer for that not to happen. We have tried cleaning the couch with other things but this did the job and it was only the first round. I can only see the couch looking better and better.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Loud
customer_reviews.text: By far the most powerful handheld Hot Water Extraction machine I've ever used. The suction is tremendous and the moving brush seems to do a great job of loosening up embedded dirt. It also happens to be the loudest Hot Water Extraction machines I've ever used, but I'll happily forgive that little trait because it does such a great job of sucking the dirt out of couches and chairs. Just take note of the location of the soapy water spray before you start using it for the first time. I didn't realize that the nozzle was under the handle, so I ended up spraying myself in the first few strokes.
customer_reviews.author: StudioVRM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, powerful little spot cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This little spot cleaner is great! We have a geriatric dog, a long-haired cat, and cream-colored carpet in the bedrooms, so we've had a couple of spot cleaners over the years. This one is the best. Compared with the Bissell SpotClean Pro, which was our last model, it's most sturdy, easier to clean, and has much more powerful suction to get the cleaning fluid (and ... other fluids) out of carpet and upholstery. I'm really pleased, and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: OhEdith

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great gadget for getting up messes... pet messes for example. The new rubber brushes are much better that the previous scrub brushes. The two clear jugs that hold clean/dirty water do not set upright on their own or empty completely. However, all of these machines have that issue. I bought this to replace the previous version that broke after a few uses. Hopefully this one holds up better
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Panda

customer_reviews.title: Failed within a year and was responsible for shipping it back to manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rug doctor about 8 months ago, used it probably 6-8 times and the sprayer stopped working. Called tech support and they went through a very basic troubleshooting process then asked me to ship the rug doctor to them and I had to pay for shipping which was $34.24. Pretty upset with this product and the support I got from the company on this. For it to fail within less than a year and then I’m responsible to cover shipping is just poor business. I’d recommend looking into a better working product from a company who supports their customers better.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the cleaning this shampoo does. We have pets in our host and to see how much dirt this machine pick up is impressive. Light enough to haul around. Easy to fill and empty compartments. Come with two compartments that are labeled as clean water and dirty. Comes with two handles; one to carry the shampooer and other to roll. The handle to roll shampooer is a bit flimsy. Don't use this handle to carry. I would recommend this to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: trouble*2

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This machine worked really well the first three and half weeks. However, the vacuum suction stopped working even though the motor was running. I took it down to an authorized rug doctor repair shop and they do not work on these machines. I returned it to Amazon since it was within the 30 day window. I replaced it with the white and red version hoping I'll have better results even though they are identical except for the hose end.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Crazy for the price! I recommend 10/10!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a mobile detailer and i am using this to extract the seats and carpets. Looks like chocolate milk does it not? :) I totally recommend.... will update durability as the time goes on... love how there is a carry handle and another adjustable handle to roll it around. big container to hold water!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have pets, but I have kids which most of you know is basically the same thing in terms of stains. I tried it on an old juice stain my husband made on our mattress. I feel like along with the club action it did a decent job. The only thing is I wish it had more suction to get the water back up. Overall, I'm happy with my purchase. I can't wait to clean my furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Cain

customer_reviews.title: Atomizes pet urine for “delightful” effect.
customer_reviews.text: It has great suction and can really clean carpet well. The fatal flaw of this machine is that humidity gets pulled through the waste tank and will come out the vents as either drainage or atomized mist. The main problem this causes is when we clean pet irons on the carpet and we have urine steam spraying out of the back of the machine. It is disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Hose is too short
customer_reviews.text: Hose is too short. The hose needs to be about 3 feet longer so I don't need to drag the machine around to reach the top of my couch and chairs. I haven't tried it in a car yet but I imagine I'll struggle with hose length there as well. 2nd picture shows how much dirty water leaked out when I removed the tank. Tank was way under FULL line.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Innis

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to my home care tools
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job on the upholstery and stairs. Strong suction and areas dried quickly after shampooing. Glad I bought this machine. It is certainly a safer way to clean the carpet on the stairs then attempting to use my full size machine which does have attachments for upholstery and stairs but the hose is too short and the suction is only fair.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Ann

customer_reviews.title: Leaks dirty water
customer_reviews.text: Pretty big disappointment. I've had for a few months, worked really well in the beginning, then it started leaking dirty water from the bottom of the machine. I would have to clean up behind the machine... Pretty inconvenient and annoying to have to do extra deep cleaning! Figured I'd just keep using to see if it was just glitch that would work itself out, it didn’t. After doing that for a few uses, I’ve decided to ask for a replacement or seek another cleaner. Will update once the situation has been resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3rd use
customer_reviews.text: It broke after 3rd use working in getting fixed so we will see
customer_reviews.author: Starla Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer. Saved my rug.
customer_reviews.text: This has paid for itself already. My kids have spilled red fruit punch on my rug and it came out. The machine is small enough to pull out and use before the stain sets. Suction is good, but you do need to go over the area a few times and make sure the vaccum part of the handset is level with the surface. You will be able to hear when suction is truly happening.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Katula

customer_reviews.title: First one I've owned but it seems to work great.
customer_reviews.text: The previous complaints are rediculous, like the lady complaining about the water tank not standing up when it's off the unit. Please, how spoiled and sheltered are you? Every design has things that are tradeoffs, just prop it up in your sink. I couldn't believe how much stuff came out of my car seats, especially the smell.
customer_reviews.author: DixieWrecked

customer_reviews.title: Get a Bissell.
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks, not literally. I had an issue right from the start. The sprayer would leak when performing jobs, suction wasn’t strong either. The other day, it stopped sucking for good. I went to Walmart and got a bissell green standard. It BLOWS this machine out of the water. I’m so happy with the bissell.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE SMELL
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with our new puppy and house training. It works great- BUT it smells like hot dog pee every time I use it😭 (I clean it after every use) literally almost throw up every tome I have to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Dearman

customer_reviews.title: Great spot cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: This works really well, much better than our previous carpet cleaner. One nice thing is that, because of all the suction, the carpet is much dryer when done, it's barely damp. I was able to clean up fresh wet paint splatters with the moving brush. The water containers are a bit slippery and tricky to take out - there isn't a handle to grab, just a narrowed corner. But you get the hang of it. I like the way it packs up to put away. The carry handle and roller/handle are handy.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine E Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised this little guy is super powerful and worked great! I have a full size for my rugs but the handheld doesn’t work half of the time, this little guy rocks! Just like another review, it does leave a messy spot so definitely want to put in on a towel when using but otherwise awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hausmann

customer_reviews.title: 2nd rug doctor stopped working again!! Can't return it!!
customer_reviews.text: Second machine, it was great that Rug Doctor replacing it the first time! But one doesn't know the motor for the sprayer will stop working. I received the new one, use it for my vehicles! Cleaned it and put it away, bring it out to do my upholstery on my vehicles again! I took the machine out of storage to use again and of course it was this fall, a year over past the warranty for return. The motor stopped working!!! I ONLY USED IT ONCE!! NEVER BUY this machine as the machine motor burns out!!
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerDude

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how great this little wonder is! We used it on our 5x8 rug which our pet had soiled over about a year and it actually did a better job than the professional I had in last time. Yes it takes some elbow grease but the results are so great that we finished the job with gusto. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Will E.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I’m in early stages of my pregnancy but my sense of smell has gone insane. I couldn’t stand the smell of my couch anymore (have had it for a year and we have a dog) so I caved and purchased this. Works great and the couch seemed to dry quickly. I’m taking 1 star away because it seems like it leaks. It also tends to get messy when spraying. Even after I stop spraying the solution it’s still leaking as I vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When it worked, it worked well
customer_reviews.text: Died after cleaning 1 seat in a 4 seat car. The sprayer and the mechanical brush both stopped working at the same time- UPDATE 9/27: I returned it for a replacement. Why? Because Amazon is awesome and makes it too easy for a problem to be rectified when you receive something defective. Giving Rug Doctor the benefit of the doubt. If the second one fails, then it will be on to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sonos

customer_reviews.title: Great a cleaning up ribs!
customer_reviews.text: This carpet cleaner did an amazing job cleaning up the ribs my dogs puked all over the newly installed carpet in our master bedroom after my genius husband decided to feed his leftovers to them right before going to bed. Amazingly my husband didn’t see the the vomit spewed all over our bedroom while getting ready for work, fortunately I had the pleasure of stepping in a pile once I woke up. This carpet cleaner may be small, but it managed the clean all of the spots out of my carpet, and save our marriage.
customer_reviews.author: Chubby Mako

customer_reviews.title: Great spot remover.
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use and has great suction. The cleaning head is very thick so does not get into crevices well. So not good for car detailing or couches with non removable cushions. After prolonged use the cleaning head starts to feel heavy. Overall it does get the job done. Works awesome on pet stains.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stearns

customer_reviews.title: Malfunction item
customer_reviews.text: This item was used once and malfunctions. Don't waste your money. The spray comes out of a windex bottle better than the spray on this unit which is paltry at best. The suction is adequate, but for spot removal-it's worthless and going to the junk yard.
customer_reviews.author: dragonlady1

customer_reviews.title: Carpets + Pets + Kids = Rug Doctor Spot Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Carpets + Pets + Kids = Rug Doctor Spot Cleaner - I have had 3 occasions already to use this machine and it works great for small jobs. My tip for anybody who purchases the unit...cleaning the machine. Watch the capacity on the "dirty" tank...before emptying the tank vacuum some fresh water through the system to clean the head and hose (careful - because you can overfill the dirty tank if you don't pay attention!) Then make sure to lift the dirty tank straight up - the ports to fill the tank are on the top back and your dirty water will spill out rapidly if you tip. Great size! Great product - well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this bad baby does his job
customer_reviews.text: honestly my fault i didnt realize it was gonna be SO precise, so its kinda hard to do big areas of carpet, but thats no fault of the device just dont make my mistake lol. objectively it does a rly great job of cleaning, even if it can be time consuming for big areas. it did save my butt when i spilled hot cocoa on my carpet. i cried out in agony then remembered i had THE rug doctor in my house. its like nothing ever happened, and my roommates are nonethewiser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad....
customer_reviews.text: This little Rug Doctor does a good job. The agitating head brush is not very efficient , you need to use a good brush and do a little scrubbing yourself otherwise not a bad little machine..
customer_reviews.author: A.P.A, Palmdale ,ca

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well for a portable unit
customer_reviews.text: I've used this on light carpet with some pretty bad grease and oil stains from my boots. Typically am able to get the stains out before my wife gets home and she never notices. I purchased this for automotive and tractor cleaning and it does work great for that too.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas P. Frantz

customer_reviews.title: then suck up the sudsy mix
customer_reviews.text: I use this machine to "rinse" my car seats after scrubbing them with upholstery cleaner. I fill the tank with hot water and spray the seats with the water, then suck up the sudsy mix. I followed another reviewer's suggestion and stuck a needle in the sprayer nozzle to clear it becaue it refused to spray at first. The cord is plenty long, but I would like for the machine to have another 2 to 3 feet of hose so the head can reach most of the way across the inside of the car. This is a much less expensive alternative to a professional extractor.
customer_reviews.author: K. Faaborg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine!
customer_reviews.text: I received very quickly after ordering on Prime. Good timing because I recently brought home a 1 year old wolfhound mix. She just happened, the other day to find the cat food, which I mistakenly thought was too high for her to reach. Needless to say very early one morning after her kitty food discovery I was using the spot cleaner after she left an incredible present. I had previously used a Bissell Handsfree Spotbot Pet cleaner which I thought was doing a pretty good job, until I received this machine. This machine is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job. Our carpet is stained from our dog. Was easy to use and easy to clean. Moving it around was simple with two different handles. One caution is when taking off the “dirty” water tank, there is a whol where you pour it out. I didn’t not realize this and dumped dirty water all over the carpet. I would be nice if the soap button was a click on click off and not something you have to hold. Great for small jobs but I wouldn’t want to do anything larger than the area I did.
customer_reviews.author: martiniblonde

customer_reviews.title: The Rug Doctor brand is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I’ve been the regular rug doctor at my business for over 8 years now and it’s one of the best things a business owner with carpet can invest in. That being said, I am so glad I got this portable unit to clean chairs, sofas etc at my business but I decided to clean my vehicle first. Look at the picture! Clear water with rug doctor soap / solution came out extraaaa nasty & dark. Rug doctor brand is one of the best brands in my opinion. Pays for itself over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: SAAJAAN00

customer_reviews.title: The best out there
customer_reviews.text: great portable machine 10 amps of suction most of them have 3 to 5 amps tops so better suction power means better cleaning power. I have 3 dogs and 2 cats and would not be without this machine . It is the best one I found on the market that's portable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kraut

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality !
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this, and the first one wasn't working very well, I decided to try and get a replacement to see if maybe mine was just bad, and IT WAS. The 2nd one came and I AM SO HAPPY WITH THIS PURCHASE! Excellent for stairs AND MY CAR! Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: good value, good product
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine. Easy to use and super portable. Not too heavy, easy tank to dump. Just watch out for the dump spout on the side. Easy to slosh around and dump dirty water on yourself or the floor if not careful. It's small so not a huge issue but can be overlooked. Great suction power, doesn't oversaturate the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Hyzenthlay

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have a puppy and thought that this cleaner would help with accidents. It sucks up well enough, but emits a horrible odor. It smells like the waste water. I have tried adding a little vinegar to try and get rid of the odor. I use the cleaner the moment he pees and several days later, I see pee stains. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned many area cleaners. Love this one. We have an senior dog and he has accidents. This is easy to use, light and I love the extending handle to move around. Suction is great and cleaning the machine is super easy.
customer_reviews.author: TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is!
customer_reviews.text: Suction isn't as good as we expected. It says for upholstery but it would work better with better suction. Left the part of the couch we did try to clean very wet. On our living room rug it worked very well. So at the end of the day, it isn't Stanley Cleaner but they didn't say it was. We are keeping it annd just give upholstery a long time to dry.😊
customer_reviews.author: JT Holdings

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! I have 2 messy boys and microfiber furniture. Microfiber shows any and all liquids that come in contact with it, and my furniture looked terrible. I should have taken before and after pictures dang it! My furniture looks like brand new again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! I have a new adopted rescue dog and was concerned about the issues that go along with that, and quite frankly my other dog. This is easy to use, cleans the messes and not cumbersome like a full size Rug Doctor. Some complained about the noise, but I didn't find that a problem. I want it to work hard and that's the price we pay. If you are a pet owner, I suggest buying a black light flash light to accompany your cleaning to really spot clean. I feel like my floors are super clean and that makes me super happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mn Girl

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for cleaning pet accidents. From vomit to urine and it works great. I usually clean the majority of the mess up with a towel or paper towels. Then pour water over the area before scrubbing lightly and suctioning it up. I don’t use much cleaner solution, and I am happy with the results. I had a 10 yea old spot bot previously. This has a much larger hand held devise with better suction, and easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: DThorne08

customer_reviews.title: Stains come right out and the carpet looks great. Machine is super easy to use and handy ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this weekly since I got it to clean up messes from my elderly dog and to clean up stains that were in the carpet when we moved in. It has worked perfectly!! Stains come right out and the carpet looks great. Machine is super easy to use and handy to carry around the house. I also used it to clean a 7 year old microfiber couch and it looks almost new again. Perfect for spot cleaning and upholstery. Canisters are easy to clean out as well. The clean water one doesn't dry out real well because it only has a small hole in the bottom. The dirty canister washes easily and dries out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mulanax

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cleaner! Suction is much better than other cleaners ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cleaner! Suction is much better than other cleaners I have had in the past. I have a cat with a hairball issue so this is near by at all times. The brush action is side to side so it does not mess up the carpet fibers.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Weber

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: If this was on 4 wheels like a suitcase it would be a little easier to maneuver around. It does a good job of cleaning for a small machine and the water canisters are a little awkward but overall it does the job for what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Pineapple Queen

customer_reviews.title: Saved my Carpet
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this unit if you are training a puppy, it has saved my carpet many times over. As long as you get to the accident/spill quickly it will suck it right up. Portability is excellent, and I have had it over a year with no issues
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, under performing.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to clean the smell out of furniture, just use a febreeze bottle because thats about all this thing does. Scrub brush it is worthless and its not great for stains. Maybe if I made a dozen passes on something I MIGHT be able to start telling a difference. May be better off with some spray, a scrub brush and a cheap wet vac.
customer_reviews.author: Nevada

customer_reviews.title: More powerful than the Little Green Machine
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace a Bissel Little green machine. Having used the Bissel until it died, I had a bit of trepidation in buying a Rug Doctor unit. I can say that it works very well. It is definitely more powerful than the little green and the scrubber is the head is far and away better than the silly rotary brush in the Bissel. That said, the handle isn't as comfortable to use and hold. It's very upright and could have been designed with more ergonomic angles. Other than that the device is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Great for couches and carpet!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! It has amazing suction and clean really well! I cleaned my entire couch with it and it got up at least 80% of the set in stains from my kids. I’ve used it on carpet and a microfiber recliner too and it’s amazing! I’ll never go back to bissel little green again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Caudillo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.  But.......
customer_reviews.text: The suction power is great, easy to use. I bought this because one of my dogs recently has bladder problems. It soaked up his accidents really well but after a month the machine wouldn't turn on. With that said, customer service was great. They sent me a FedEx ticket to send it back. I don't know if I just got a defective machine or if this is a regular complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: The dog lives another day.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two other spot removers. This is the only one I can recommend and will keep. It does what it says it will. It delivers the solution to the immediate area, and, by applying some pressure, the suction tool removes the liquid to close to dry. It's easy for me to pick up and move around the house so the furniture and carpeting stay cleaner - because I can easily stay on top of messes. I find I can leave the soap and water mixture in the machine until the next time. DO NOT leave the dirty water in the container. Wash it out immediately. And then just set it in it's slot.
customer_reviews.author: M Taty

customer_reviews.title: Love my Rug Doctor Portable!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of the Rug Doctor products and this item does not disappoint! It is super easy to use and the suction is perfect for extracting, which is much better for high pile carpet and allowing it to dry quicker! I have used this on many different surfaces and even in my car, works GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Choate

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works much better if you first use one of those circular brushes you put on drill to dislodge stain. Then use this to pull it out. I was able to clean up some very nasty car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G. Whitworth

customer_reviews.title: Great suction & nice compact design for the smaller jobs (stairs, baseboards, touch-ups)
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and works very well. I only did the edges of the carpet which touch the wall and that was enough to make the entire carpet look new again. The suction is VERY good and I like having a compact machine instead of a big bulky thing. HOWEVER, I am not as inclined, as some reviewers were, to do an entire room with this machine. It is a big exhausting to have only the hand-held suction, instead of a big rotating stand-up machine. Great for touch-ups or going along the baseboard of a room or to do the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Brave New Realty LLC

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Crap-don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Rig Doctor Machine. The suction is amazing but that’s about it. The machine leaks dirty water out the back of the machine and spews smoke out the back. Both machines did this after just a short period of time. Don’t waste your money, the quality is clearly lacking on this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Zylstra

customer_reviews.title: Great suction power. Difficult to use in tight places.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for spot cleaning on your rugs and carpet. It is not so great for use in a vehicle. The big nozzle does not allow you to get into tight places very well. Overall, I am pretty happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Roemmich

customer_reviews.title: Completely broken DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: After using this item for 20 mins the brush head stopped moving and the spray nozzle no longer worked. When I moved the machine I found that the dirty water had leaked out from the brief time I had been able to use it. So it wound up making much more of a mess than it actually cleaned and now doesn't even work. Horrible product don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S Cliff

customer_reviews.title: I used it on carpet that was never cleaned in ten years of use and three dirty dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Works for me on a small areas. Uses a lot of work and needs to be cleaned after each tank full of cleaner. I used it on carpet that was never cleaned in ten years of use and three dirty dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: We have had various brands of portable carpet cleaners with this one being the best thus far. Pros: Easy to transport, good suction, powered brush is effective, ample sized water tanks, cleans well, and hose appears to be constructed better than competitors. Cons: Dirty water escapes from the dirty water tank at the vacuum seal and the clean water tank is hard to handle when filling.
customer_reviews.author: Brent A.

customer_reviews.title: Annoying to clean and not worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this when we brought our puppy home in March. We’ve used it only twice because we found it frustrating to empty and clean and it didn’t pull up any stains on our carpet. We found it easier to use a damp rag and then used Bissell spot cleaning pads which worked better than this vacuum did. The sections that hold clean water and dirty water take forever to dry out, and the hose gets dirt and hair stuck in it and I've yet to try and take it apart. Picture attached. We don’t use and wish we could return.
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: very poor suction
customer_reviews.text: This machine is like a toy... It has very little suction. The hose is very short, and the cord is very short. It just feels like a plastic toy. I returned it... I need a real cleaner with real suction!
customer_reviews.author: S Hansen

customer_reviews.title: I washed the entire hallway of a 3-family house and it was great. THe rug was clean and smelled refreshed
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised. I washed the entire hallway of a 3-family house and it was great. THe rug was clean and smelled refreshed. The suction was very good and the water canister worked well; needed to empty about 3 times, but again, I did three floors of hallway and steps!!!! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sophicant

customer_reviews.title: Rug Doctor always delivers
customer_reviews.text: this thing does a fantastic job for auto detailing. I have more expensive upholstery cleaners from autogeek and this blows them out of the water price and quality wise.
customer_reviews.author: F250Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Overall it works good.
customer_reviews.text: I am not to happy with the water/soap tank. Every time you lift up to remove the water tank, this rubber coupler that’s designed at the base, leaks water. It should have been a self sealing design.
customer_reviews.author: tucker8297

customer_reviews.title: I definitely liked the design in terms of portability
customer_reviews.text: It has decent suction for the price. I definitely liked the design in terms of portability, but the head on this thing needs to be redesigned because it is way too big. The bottom line for me was it leaking after usage. Pros: decent suction for price, portable Cons: Leaks, giant head (hard to use in tight nit spaces) PS: Turbo brush feature is practically useless in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this a couple years ago, because the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple years ago, because the rentals don't work for upholstery. I used it on the carpets and furniture in my (new for me) 1993 camper. (The camper has much less carpet than the house.) Rent a Rug Doctor for your carpets; for furniture or spot clean-ups, you want this.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin A Prusko

The slim, compact design fits on a single stair, inside a car and stores easily in cabinets or closets. Portable Spot Cleaner offers twice the suction power than comparable leading spot cleaners for cleaner homes and shorter drying times.
